event.title: an important role throughout much of its existence; it is over 2,700 years

data.event: The city is noted for its history, culture, architecture and gastronomy, playing an important role throughout much of its existence; it is over 2,700 years old.
The city was founded in 734 BC by the Phoenicians as Ziz ('flower').

event.title: 1072 the city was under Arab rule during the Emirate of Sicily when the city first became

data.event: From 831 to 1072 the city was under Arab rule during the Emirate of Sicily when the city first became a capital.
Eventually Sicily would be united with the Kingdom of Naples to form the Kingdom of the Two Sicilies until the Italian unification of 1860.
